survey.name: Mr. Willian Vissaris

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes-that is, the brand you smoke most often?
Is your regular brand Regular/King Size?
Is your regular brand Menthol or Non-Menthol?
Is your regular brand... Check one
List all the brands of cigarettes you smoked in the past two weeks. How many packs of each?
How long have you smoked this brand?
What if any was your last purchase (brand)?
The next time you go to the store and your regular brand is not available, what would you do?
options: Go to another store to buy my regular brand
Buy another type or length of my regular brand

questions.question: Which of the following best describes your ethnic group?
How often do you use cigarette coupons?
options: I use almost any cigarette coupon
I occasionally use coupons for cigarettes
I use coupons only if they are for my regular brand

questions.question: How often do you look for special offers, such as free gifts or special prices?

survey.note: If the store where you buy cigarettes hasn't heard about the change in Philip Morris brand pricing, please leave this friendly calling card letting them know how to get details. ANNOUNCING NEW VALUE PRICING ON PHILIP MORRIS BRANDS. And thanks for your patience.
